sentence.Network_en: King Solomon made himself a palanquin Of the wood of Lebanon.
sentence.Network_cn: 9所罗门王用利巴嫩木,为自己制造一乘华轿.

sentence.Network_en: Four attendants bore the queen's palanquin.
sentence.Network_cn: 四个随从抬着王后的轿子.

sentence.Network_en: It is a one - horse palanquin, said the old gentleman, who was a wag in his way.
sentence.Network_cn: 她只是沐浴在他的感情的温煦之中, 像是一个挨冷受冻的人喜逢熊熊的炉火.

list.abs: 还没有人谈过"花轿泪 Le Palanquin des Larmes"。来做第一个。 哪些内容不适合这里 ···  请尊重创作者的劳动,不要在讨论区里提供或讨论下载方面的内容。.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Portuguese palanquim, from Oriya pālańki, based on Sanskrit palyanka 'bed, couch'

means.word_mean: 1. a closed litter carried on the shoulders of four bearers
